content.rendered:
Directed by Mark Chow. Dennis Heaton. Mathias Herndl. Nimisha Mukerji. Jovanka Vuckovic. Director X.

Written by Kim Garland. Dennis Heaton. Shelley Eriksen. Gorrman Lee. Kor Adana. Steve Cochrane. Laurie-Anne Smith

Cast Italia Ricci( Dr. Sydney Burke10 episodes, 2022 ). Morgan Taylor Campbell( Tilda Webber10 episodes, 2022 ). Rhianna Jagpal( Abbi Singh10 episodes, 2022 ). Iñaki Godoy( Juan Ruiz10 episodes, 2022 ). Kyra Zagorsky( Isabel Finch9 episodes, 2022 ). Rhys Nicholson( Dr. Alex Sarkov7 episodes, 2022 ). Celina Martin( Hannah Moore7 episodes, 2022 ). Rekha Sharma( Dominique Crain5 episodes, 2022 ). Junnicia Lagoutin( Darcy Cobourg5 episodes, 2022 ). Ron Selmour( Agent Jim Sponson5 episodes, 2022 ). Jedidiah Goodacre( P.J.3 episodes, 2022 ). Kai Bradbury( Nathaniel Lang3 episodes, 2022 ). Max Lloyd-Jones( Doug2 episodes, 2022 ). Jennifer Cheon Garcia( Det. Sonja Benning2 episodes, 2022 ). Wesley MacInnes( Owen Schultz2 episodes, 2022 ). Diego Stredel( Alejandro Ruiz2 episodes, 2022 ). Manuela Sosa( Renata Ruiz2 episodes, 2022 ). Brandon Fung( Maxwell2 episodes, 2022 ). Chris Cope( Gareth2 episodes, 2022 ). Siddhartha Minhas( Ben Singh2 episodes, 2022 ). Alex Rockhill( Dealer2 episodes, 2022 ). Louriza Tronco(1 episode, 2022 ). Maemae Renfrow( Zoe1 episode, 2022 ). John Cassini( Dr. Brian Yake1 episode, 2022 ). Mariesa Crouse( Paula1 episode, 2022 ). Mya Lowe( Jules1 episode, 2022 ). Veronica Long( Rose1 episode, 2022 ). Naika Toussaint( Melanie1 episode, 2022 ). Mark Sweatman( Clown1 episode, 2022 ). E.J. Katz( Shelly1 episode, 2022 ). Jake Guy( Jeff1 episode, 2022 ). Ali Karr( Reginald Lindt1 episode, 2022 ). Jesse Arthur Carroll( Agent Mcgrath1 episode, 2022 ). Leslie Kwan( Paul1 episode, 2022 ). Romeo Reyes( Biker #11 episode, 2022 ). Ben Francis( Simon1 episode, 2022 ). Jorden Birch( Officer Davis1 episode, 2022 ). Sarah Te Wong( Flux Agent #31 episode, 2022)

Language English

Producers Jay Daniel Beechinor. Morris Chapdelaine. Michael Frislev. Todd Giroux. Justis Greene. Mathias Herndl. Gorrman Lee. Chad Oakes. Shelley Eriksen. Dennis Heaton

Production Lux Visual Effects. Nomadic Pictures.

Certificate 15+

Official site Netflix

Season 1

Episodes 10
